comments:
Steps To Reproduce:
1.Start a java application at the command line using '-XrunpiAgent=controlled'
2.Profile: Attach-Java process
3.Select the agent from step 1
4. Open your Error log and see the following error is produced:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3374)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3297)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.checkWidget(Widget.java:331)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree.getSelection(Tree.java:2911)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TreeViewer.getSelection(TreeViewer.java:471)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TreeViewer.setSelection(TreeViewer.java:686)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.setSelectionToWidget(AbstractTreeViewer.java:2221)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.setSelectionToWidget(StructuredViewer.java:1621)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.setSelectionToWidget(AbstractTreeViewer.java:2596)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.preservingSelection(StructuredViewer.java:1330)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.refresh(StructuredViewer.java:1386)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.refresh(StructuredViewer.java:1345)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.internal.ui.PDProjectViewer.selectObject(PDProjectViewer.java:160)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.internal.ui.PDProjectExplorer.handleProfileEvent(PDProjectExplorer.java:493)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.common.ui.trace.internal.helpers.TraceUIManager.notifyProfileEventListener(TraceUIManager.java:163)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.UIPlugin.notifyProfileEventListener(UIPlugin.java:561)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.ProfileUIManager.startMonitoring(ProfileUIManager.java:164)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.deleg.application.PIAttachLauncherDelegate.launch(PIAttachLauncherDelegate.java:75)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.launcher.ProfileAttachDelegate.launch(ProfileAttachDelegate.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)

More information:
Please reassign if necessary.
Problem is reproducible on both 4.3.1 and 4.4 builds.
cannot be contained in i2, moved to i3.
problem does not exist in 4.4.0-200705021157 anymore.
